name: DD – Flexible Sidebars
author: Hendrik Schuster

sections.description:
Dynamically create, populate and advice individual sidebars for any post, page or attachment.
Adds a field in the post editor for choosing or creating a new sidebar. You can find a additional default sidebar option in the ‘general options screen’ of your wordpress installation.

To Do

  • Add a option to inherit custom sidebars.
  • A better sidebar handling to create and remove sidebars.
  • Better translations.

Languages

  • English (default)
  • German
  • …
  • Send me your translation files!
sections.installation:
Installing:

Manual Installation: Unzip all files to the /wp-content/plugins/dd-flex-sidebars directory.

Automatic Installation: Use the WordPress Plugin search to install the plugin.

Activate: Log into WordPress admin and activate the ‘DD – Flex Sidebars’ plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu.

Usage:

  1. Advice a new or existing sidebar in the editor screen. Save.
  2. Go to Design > Widgets in the left-hand menu. Populate the newly created widget area.
  3. Save the widgets and check the result.
